comments.content: Looks totally hand-drawn to me. All repeating letters look different. Will see if I could provide some alternatives.

Thank you!! We've been researching without much luck, seeming hand-drawn to us as well. Just found a Edward Penfield style font : bu Penfield Deco by bosil unique fonts.  
This was helpful!

Thanks to your 'Penfield' reference, I got this one at MyFonts: [Harpers July AZ](http://web.archive.org/web/20140331084859/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/artistofdesign/az-harpers-july) which looks not so far. Another one [Plug Italic AZ](http://web.archive.org/web/20140331084859/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/artistofdesign/az-plug-italic) but italic only.

Luc Devroye's Edward Penfield Page [http://luc.devroye.org/fonts-67392.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20140331084859/http:/luc.devroye.org/fonts-67392.html "http://luc.devroye.org/fonts-67392.html")  
Includes good quality images of his hand lettered Modern American Capitals and Modern American Lowercase. This is as close as I have seen to a standardized alphabet of Penfield's concept of an alphabet.  
Seems to be the source of Penfield Deco by bosil unique fonts [http://www.fontspace.com/bosil-unique-fonts/bu-penfield-deco](http://web.archive.org/web/20140331084859/http:/www.fontspace.com/bosil-unique-fonts/bu-penfield-deco "http://www.fontspace.com/bosil-unique-fonts/bu-penfield-deco") Decide for yourself how well the digital version catches Penfield's letters.  
Don

Plug Italic AZ [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/artistofdesign/az-plug-italic/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140331084859/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/artistofdesign/az-plug-italic/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/artistofdesign/az-plug-italic/") combines the work of Edward Penfield and Frank Hazenplug. Luc Devroyes's Frank Hazenplug Page [http://luc.devroye.org/fonts-51819.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20140331084859/http:/luc.devroye.org/fonts-51819.html "http://luc.devroye.org/fonts-51819.html") Includes good quality images of his hand lettered Modern American Capitals, two sets, and Frank Hazenplug Script.  
Don
